vista.time
Class TimeFactory

java.lang.Object
  vista.time.TimeFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TimeFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A factory initialized with instances of classes to be used as prototypes for creating further instances.

Version:
$Id: TimeFactory.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:36 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
See Also:
